title: Price of juice rises, decreased quantity demanded

content.question: According to the law of demand, an increase in the price of grape juice will result in

choices.label: a rightward shift in the demand curve for grape juice
a leftward shift in the demand curve for grape juice
a decrease in the demand for orange juice, a substitute
a decrease in the quantity of grape juice demanded
an increase in the quantity of grape juice supplied

content.answer: a decrease in the quantity of grape juice demanded

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
